retail_miner.label: Retail Miner
retail_miner.help: e.g., mining crypto and use of a co-location provider to operate/maintain ASICs

industrial_miner.label: Industrial Miner
industrial_miner.help: e.g., mining of crypto and owning or leasing the commercial space where the operation takes place

co_location_provider.label: Co-location Provider
co_location_provider.help: e.g., maintaining/operating other crypto miners' ASICs for a fee

other_business.label: Is the applicant involved in any business or ventures not covered by their “Description of Business Operations” above?

is_subsidiary.label: Is the applicant business a subsidiary of another entity?
is_subsidiary.help: If "Yes", please advise the parent company, relationship description and percentage ownership breakdown.

has_subsidiaries.label: Does the applicant have any subsidiaries?
has_subsidiaries.help: If "Yes", please advise the subsidiart company name(s), relationship description and percentage ownership breakdown.

has_exposures.label: Do your operations have any exposure to flammables, explosives, chemicals, oil, and/or gas?

existing_insurance.label: Do you have existing insurance for cryptocurrency mining and/or hosting?
existing_insurance.help: If "Yes", please provide a copy of your current policy and 5 years loss runs, if available.

existing_insurance_details.label: Provide copy of policy and 5 years loss runs

other_evertas.label: Does your company have any other insurance with Evertas?
other_evertas.help: If "Yes", please advise your policy number and effective dates.

declined_coverage.label: Have you had any policy or coverage declined, cancelled, or non-renewed during the prior three (3) years for any premises or operations?

declined_details2.label: Condition Corrected:
declined_details2.help: Populate only if "Condition Corrected" is selected.

past_losses.label: Any past losses or claims relating to sexual abuse or molestation allegations, discrimination, or negligent hiring?

fraud_crime.label: During the last five (5) years (ten [10] in RI), has any applicant been indicted for or convicted of any degree of the crime of fraud, bribery, arson, or any other arson-related crime in connection with this or any other property?

code_violations.label: Any uncorrected fire, electrical, and/or safety code violations?
code_violations.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

foreclosure.label: Has applicant had a foreclosure, repossession, bankruptcy or filed for bankruptcy in the last five (5) years?
foreclosure.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

felony_conviction.label: Do any named insured(s), officer(s), owner(s), or partner(s) have a prior felony conviction and/or been involved in business related lawsuits, mediations or arbitrations in the past 5 years?
felony_conviction.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

felony_conviction_details4.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

judgement_lien.label: Have you had a judgement or lien during the last five (5) years?
judgement_lien.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution.

placed_in_trust.label: Has your business been placed in a trust?
placed_in_trust.help: If "Yes", please advise the name of the trust.

regulatory_dispute.label: Are you currently in or have knowledge of being involved in any regulatory dispute?
regulatory_dispute.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

regulatory_dispute_details4.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

licensing_dispute.label: Are you currently in or have knowledge of being involved in any licensing dispute?
licensing_dispute.help: If "Yes", please advise the date, explanation, resolution, and date of resolution or expected date of resolution.

licensing_dispute_details4.label: Date of Resolution/Expected Date of Resolution:

inland_marine_electronic_data_processing.label: Inland Marine Electronic Data Processing (EDP) Coverage

third_party.label: Do you use a third party to host or co-locate your cryptocurrency mining equipment?

extended_deductibles.label: Extended Coverage Deductibles (i.e., Wind/Hail/Named Storm) ($10,000 Minimum) - per occurrence

electrical_supply.label: On-Site Electrical and Power Supply Disturbance and Website Servers

monthly_expanses_coverage.label: Monthly operational expense coverage (i.e., debt[principal & interest], payroll, power/electrical costs)
monthly_expanses_coverage.help: Optional Business Interruption Coverage | If "Yes", note your total monthly expense/cost for your cryptocurrency mining operation.

mining_hardware.label: Does your cryptocurrency mining hardware, or any hardware in your care, custody, and/or control, operate above 110% of its/their efficiency via firmware upgrades/updates or other means (e.g., 'overclocking')?
mining_hardware.help: If "Yes", please advise what percentage of the computers are 'overclocked' and at which building(s) and/or container number(s) and at which location(s).

mining_hardware_cooling.label: Is any cryptocurrency mining hardware cooled using liquid immersion?
mining_hardware_cooling.help: If "Yes", please advise what percentage of the computers are cooled with liquid immersion and at which building(s) and/or container number(s) and at which location(s).

risk_mitigation.label: Risk Mitigation
risk_mitigation.help: Please advise which location number(s) have the following [location numbers should correspond to the location(s) listed in item Location(s) Insured; each location will be inspected to verify the following answers.

risk_mitigation_if_yes_3.label: C. Active centrally monitored burglar alarm

risk_mitigation_if_yes_4.label: D. Active centrally monitored fire alarm

risk_mitigation_if_yes_5.label: E. Active centrally monitored temperature alarm or monitored with a smartphone

risk_mitigation_if_yes_6.label: F. Active centrally monitored heat and/or humidity alarm

risk_mitigation_if_yes_7.label: G. Keypad and/or biometric entry locks

risk_mitigation_if_yes_8.label: H. 24/7 surveillance cameras and/or closed-circuit television

risk_mitigation_if_yes_10.label: J. Power surge protection device(s) (e.g., Transient Voltage Surge Suppressor [TVSS])

risk_mitigation_if_yes_11.label: K. Automatic back-up generator installed on-site

risk_mitigation_if_yes_12.label: L. Containers / Pods / Modular Solutions where the computers operate

risk_mitigation_if_yes_14.label: 25 feet of separation between each container, on all sides, with no fire bridges (indoors & outdoors)

risk_mitigation_if_yes_15.label: Fire extinguishers (in or on each container/pod)

risk_mitigation_if_yes_16.label: Premises are gated/fenced and inaccessible except via secure entrance

risk_mitigation_if_yes_17.label: All Containers/pods are bolted down to a concrete slab or suitably anchored to the ground

risk_mitigation_if_yes_18.label: M. Computers operate 'off-grid' (e.g., oil and gas extraction site in remote location)

risk_mitigation_if_yes_19.label: Adequate separation from power/energy/gas/oil generating equipment

risk_mitigation_if_yes_20.label: N. Will client provide watcher link(s) for all insured mining computers?
